doc:
Wild Bill Longson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wild_Bill_Longson 0 Willard Rowe Longson (June 8, 1906 – December 12, 1982) was an American professional wrestler, better known by his ring name, Wild Bill Longson. He spent most of his career in St. Louis, Missouri. He perfected the role of the arrogant heel, and is credited with inventing and popularizing the piledriver. Willard_Rowe_Longson ( June_8_,_1906 – December_12_,_1982 ) was an_American_professional_wrestler , better_known by his_ring_name , Wild_Bill_Longson . He spent most of his_career in St._Louis , Missouri . He perfected the_role of the_arrogant_heel , and is_credited with inventing_and_popularizing the_piledriver .
